services.name: Personal Financial Management API
services.description: Facilitates the management of personal finances, including budgeting and expense tracking.

services.name: Insurance Policy Information Retrieval Service
services.description: Provides access to details about various insurance policies, their coverage, and premium estimates.

services.name: Real-Time Stock Market Data Access
services.description: Offers live data on stock prices, market trends, and trading volumes to assist investors.

services.name: Credit Eligibility Checking System
services.description: Allows users to assess creditworthiness for loans or other financial products.

services.name: Online Payment Gateway Integration API
services.description: Enables secure and seamless transaction processing for e-commerce and banking purposes.
